name: Queso
body:
### Hosted Services
If you'd just like to give Queso a test spin, you can sign up for a free hosted account.  To create an instructor account and course, just go to [queso.cc/register/instructor](http://queso.cc/register/instructor)

### Host It Yourself?
If you're the type of person that likes having everything on your own server, just download the files and stick it on your server.  Queso is built with Laravel, so you should migrate the tables to setup the MySQL database.  In the future, there will be better documentation for this.

### Authors and Contributors
Are you a developer looking to get involved with Queso?  Fork it and contact @claytical

Are you an educator that wants to use Queso in the classroom? Got ideas to share? Add to the wiki!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
